boardgame.name: Formula Dé Mini
Formula De Mini
boardgame.description: A mini version of Formula Dé, that simplifies and streamlines some of the rules to shorten playing time._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;This game includes:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 2 racing tracks on a single board_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 5 polyhedral dice for different car speeds_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 1 black 20-sided die for car damage_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 8 cars and 8 ailerons in four different colors_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 8 dashboards and 8 aileron markers (to represent each car/aileron combination)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 8 gear shift pawns_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 200 life tokens_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 1 rules booklet_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Check the Descartes Editeur website (listed in the Links section below) for more information._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: Formula De Mini (Eurogames; English-language edition) This game has only been played once. My collection has grown too large so I have to sell off several of my games. S_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;H is $6.00 to anywhere within the continental US.
